comment: God Bless him. I wonder if he will change her name? Can' you see him saying...we can't call her Pocahontas anymore, because she ISN"T Native American? I am lobbying for "Fauxcahontas".
amr:
# ::snt God Bless him. I wonder if he will change her name? Can' you see him saying...we can't call her Pocahontas anymore, because she ISN"T Native American? I am lobbying for "Fauxcahontas".
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / bless-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "God"))
            :ARG1 (h / he))
      :snt2 (w / wonder-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (t / truth-value
                  :polarity-of (c / change-01
                        :ARG0 (h2 / he)
                        :ARG1 (n2 / name
                              :poss (s / she)))))
      :snt3 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / see-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (s3 / say-01
                        :ARG0 (h3 / he)
                        :ARG1 (c2 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (h4 / have-mod-91
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (s4 / she)
                                    :ARG2 (p3 / person
                                          :mod (e / ethnic-group
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Native"
                                                      :op2 "American"))))
                              :ARG1 (p4 / possible-01
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / call-01
                                          :ARG0 (w2 / we)
                                          :ARG1 s4
                                          :ARG2 (p5 / person
                                                :name (n4 / name
                                                      :op1 "Pocahontas"))
                                          :time (a / anymore))))))
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown))
      :snt4 (l / lobby-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (p6 / person
                  :name (n5 / name
                        :op1 "Fauxcahontas"))))

# ::snt TUCKER CARLSON WANTS FAKEAGAWEA

comment: Let's have a poll: What should "Pocahontas" Elizabeth Warren's new nickname be? -er-Cad -Marie -Plant -Actual
amr:

comment: Ok...although I am not sure it is a Native Amercian word. Sounds German to me.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / okay-01)
      :snt2 (h / have-concession-91
            :ARG2 (s / sure-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (w / word
                        :domain (ii2 / it)
                        :mod (e / ethnic-group
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Native"
                                    :op2 "American")))))
